verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Shoshannim Eduth. A Psalm of Asaph. Give <S%H238>ea<s%>, O <S%H7462>Shepherd<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thou that <S%H5090>leadest<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock<s%>; Thou that <S%H3427>sittest<s%> above the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%>, shine <S%H3313>forth<s%>.
Before <S%H6440><s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, stir <S%H5782>up<s%> thy <S%H1369>might<s%>, And <S%H3212>come<s%> to save <S%H3444>us<s%>.
Turn us <S%H7725>again<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>; And cause thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%>, and we shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%>.
O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, How long wilt thou be <S%H6225>angry<s%> against the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%>?
Thou hast <S%H398>fed<s%> them with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H1832>tears<s%>, And given them <S%H1832>tears<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> in large <S%H7991>measure<s%>.
Thou <S%H7760>makest<s%> us a <S%H4066>strife<s%> unto our <S%H7934>neighbors<s%>; And our <S%H341>enemies<s%> laugh among <S%H3932>themselves<s%>.
Turn us <S%H7725>again<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; And cause thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%>, and we shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%>.
Thou <S%H5265>broughtest<s%> a <S%H1612>vine<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: Thou didst drive <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and plantedst <S%H5193>it<s%>.
Thou <S%H6437>preparedst<s%> room <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8328>it<s%>, And it took deep <S%H8327>root<s%>, and <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.
The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H3680>covered<s%> with the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of <S%H6057>it<s%>, And the boughs thereof were like <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%>.
It sent <S%H7971>out<s%> its <S%H3127>branches<s%> unto the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, And its <S%H3127>shoots<s%> unto the <S%H5104>River<s%>.
Why hast thou broken <S%H6555>down<s%> its <S%H1447>walls<s%>, So that all they that <S%H5674>pass<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> do pluck <S%H717>it<s%>?
The <S%H2386>boar<s%> out of the <S%H3293>wood<s%> doth <S%H3765>ravage<s%> <S%H2123>it<s%>, And the wild beasts of the <S%H7704>field<s%> feed on <S%H7462>it<s%>.

Turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H430>again<s%>, we beseech thee, O God of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: Look <S%H5027>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%>, and <S%H6485>visit<s%> this <S%H1612>vine<s%>,
And the <S%H3657>stock<s%> which thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H5193>planted<s%>, And the <S%H1121>branch<s%> that thou madest strong for <S%H553>thyself<s%>.
It is <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, it is cut <S%H3683>down<s%>: They <S%H6>perish<s%> at the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of thy <S%H6440>countenance<s%>.
Let thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> be upon the <S%H376>man<s%> of thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, Upon the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> whom thou madest strong for <S%H553>thyself<s%>.
So shall we not go <S%H5472>back<s%> from <S%H2421>thee<s%>: Quicken thou <S%H7121>us<s%>, and we will call upon thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.
Turn us <S%H7725>again<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; Cause thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%>, and we shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%>.
